verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My life, my love, I give to Thee, Thou Lamb of God who died for me; Oh, may I ever faithful be, My Savior and my God!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I’ll live for Him who died for me, How happy then my life shall be! I’ll live for Him who died for me, My Savior and my God!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I now believe Thou dost receive, For Thou hast died that I might live; And now henceforth I’ll trust to Thee, My Savior and my God!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Thou who died on Calvary, To save my soul and make me free, I’ll consecrate my life to Thee, My Savior and my God!
